title: An infant in a dream and the interpretation of a dream of carrying an infant and breastfeeding a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Everything you are looking for to know the interpretation of seeing a baby in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a baby in a dreamIs the interpretation of a newborn a bad or good symbol? Does the appearance of a child in a dream affect its interpretation? What is the significance of seeing a little boy crying and screaming? Discover the most accurate interpretations of this vision in the article below. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. The little child in a dream. The jurists interpreted the dream of the infant boy, and they said that seeing him most often is a harbinger, and an indication of worries and adversity. There are many visions in which the infant child appears, and they are as follows: Seeing a sick child: indicates the presence of an ongoing problem with the dreamer for some time. But if the child she saw in her dream looked frightening and seriously ill, then in reality he is an enemy lurking around her, but she is wounded and God is planning for him. Against. Dreaming of a young boy with an ugly face: It indicates a difficult crisis and great suffering coming soon to the dreamer, and if the appearance of this child changes from ugly to beautiful, then this is a kindness from God that the dreamer will feel in his life, as God gives him strength. Which makes him remove his pain and the difficulties of his life. Seeing a handsome boy: Jurists differed in interpreting this scene. Some of them said: The more beautiful the baby is, the worse the fortuneteller’s life and her anxiety will be more than it was, and others said: If the dreamer lived a bad life and she had. Many hardships in reality, and she sees a beautiful child smiling in her dream, then this is good and a lot of money will come to her as if it were compensation and a reward from God for her. Seeing a dead child: indicates escaping from enemies, solving difficult problems, and recovering from difficult diseases. Seeing a hungry child: indicates The dreamer’s lack of interest in her children, in the event that she is a wife in reality and has young children. Some jurists have said that if the dreamer is breastfeeding his children in a dream, then he shows his tenderness and sympathy for the poor and needy. In reality, he gives them money and food in charity. The boy who is breastfed in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: Seeing the boy as an infant is bad and means sad news and many obstacles. And if the dreamer sees that he is carrying in his hand a small boy and his weight is heavy, then these are many burdens and hardships that he will soon bear. But If the dreamer sees in a dream many children, male and female, this indicates a bright life, ease in relationships and happy events. If the dreamer sees that he has become a boy in a dream, this is interpreted as a person who lacks wisdom and mental balance, and some describe him as foolish and incapable. To bear responsibility. What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a small child in a dream. Breastfeeding a boy in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a child born to an unmarried woman reveals her desire to get married, and if she was engaged not long ago and saw a beautiful child in her dream, then she will get married, but the marriage may He may be a little tired. If the boy that the unmarried woman saw in a dream is handsome, then he is new and will make her happy and remove the negative effects left by the many crises that she has experienced in her life. If the dreamer embraces a beautiful baby girl in her dream and his smell is distinctive and pleasant.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a lizard in a dream

preview.html: Lizard in a dream: Seeing a lizard is not one of the visions approved by jurists, because of its connotations that express hatred, harm, worries, lack of help, the seriousness of illness, and the seriousness of disputes. Or kill him, and in this article we take a look at all the special cases and indications of seeing a lizard in more detail and explanation. Lizard in a dream Seeing a lizard expresses the bitter vicissitudes of life, ugly bad situations, malicious intentions, sharpening of judgments, escalation of diseases, the spread of corruption and strife, sins and misdeeds, The hidden desires of the soul, poor living conditions, and engaging in bloody battles. Whoever sees a lizard, this indicates the need to think about choosing companionship and staying away from those who earn their living by deprivation, and the forbidden will continue, and hostility will be established and immorality will spread in the land. The fortuneteller can befriend the man. Whoever is bad in his dealings and morals, and makes a plan for him that hardly succeeds. From another point of view, seeing lizards for money and profits, which requires its owner to be honest with them and know their sources, may come from doubting or avoiding a diligent and malicious opponent in battles. And if the fortuneteller sees a lizard Entering his room indicates poor judgment and ignorance of the strength of the opponent or enemy. He may think that he got rid of it, but it is still present in his life, waiting for the appropriate opportunity to attack him again. The lizard in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that the lizard is interpreted as a damned lie, which tends to cold hostility, and does not calm down until it achieves its purpose and goal. A lizard in a dream indicates On illness and harm, and the intensity of disagreements and discussions, and the fortuneteller may be in a serious enmity that has lasted for a long time, and he cannot get rid of it easily or follow the whispers of Satan. And it may be a cause of disagreements, and a succession of worries and judgments. If someone sees a lizard in his house or walking behind him, this indicates the presence of an enemy among the people of the house who is hostile to the fortuneteller and shows him affection and may deprive him of his rights or deprive him of them. His money. Unknowingly, and if he catches it, then this indicates salvation from his evil and machinations. But if the lizard is on the bed, then it shows someone conspiring with the man’s wife and arousing hostility towards her. This vision also expresses the evil that befalls the dreamer from his wife and her family, as he may deceive him. Or it appears to him contrary to what he thinks and is hiding inside him. What is the interpretation of lizards in a single woman’s dream? A lizard in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes the harm or damage that has been caused to her by a man who might marry her or win her heart to form a partnership with him, and this man is deceitful and polite in speech It can convince the other party of his hidden desires and hidden intentions. If an unmarried woman is in a relationship with someone, engaged or in the process of a partnership, then her partner or close man deceives her, conspires against her, harbors malice and grudges against her and can harm her whenever the right opportunity presents itself. On the other hand The lizard interprets the person who distinguishes between loved ones. If the lizard dies, this indicates the end of the bond or relationship, and this is interesting for the fortuneteller. If you eat the meat of the lizard, this indicates illness or disease.

title: Interpretation of a dream about black dogs by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about black dogs: Many people see dogs in their dreams, especially black dogs, and they are confused and worried about the meaning of the vision. Dogs in reality can be useful and can be fierce and deadly to people. This is also true of seeing dogs in a dream and its interpretation varies according to The situation and the person. Interpretation of a dream about black dogs: Seeing black dogs in a dream has more than one different interpretation, and these interpretations depend on the nature of the dream. Among these interpretations are the following: Seeing a lot of dogs is evidence that a person lives among a large number of people who hate him and have many bad intentions. Escaping in a dream from a black dog running after him can be a sign that the person is exposed to many challenges and harassments that harm If the black dog tears the dreamer’s clothes, this means that the matter that the dreamer is hiding from people will be revealed, and by revealing this matter, his sister, daughter, or wife will be harmed and destroyed. And they will suffer greatly from this problem. A small black dog in a dream is a child. The dreamer may give birth to a boy and he will have a wonderful place in the hearts of those close to him, old and young. One of the bad meanings when seeing a black dog is to lick the dog up to the shoulder, because scholars interpreted this as betrayal. For children. When you are unruly and fight with the owner of the dream, this is evidence of the person’s desire to obtain a certain thing and he will do his best to achieve this desire, but all his efforts will fail. The dog protecting the person and his family and carrying out all his requests and orders in the dream indicates that he and his family have gained a lot. Of the good things. Black dogs in a dream are among the bad things that befall any person, because they only carry evil within them, whether it is bad and bad in money and trade, or in the loss of family and relatives, or in the misfortune that will happen. They are.Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A person who has a dog in a dream but does not have one in reality indicates that the person suffers from his inability to achieve excellence and progress in his academic, professional or social life. The dream that the person sees, but he cannot remember all the details And he only remembers that there is a black dog in it, which means that one of his family members will get into trouble and will be the reason for him getting out of it. Interpretation of a dream about black dogs for single women. A girl who sees in her sleep a group of black dogs running towards her while running over them indicates that there are quite a few bad people in this girl’s way. Those who want to harm and hurt her. A girl who buys a dog in a dream to guard her house with her love for him is evidence that the person she blindly trusts will enter this girl’s life. For a girl to see a wild dog that is difficult to tame indicates her feeling of sadness and anguish, as well as the continuation of this psychological state for a period Long. Playing with the dog, enjoying it, and being happy while dealing with it suggests the opposite, as it is evidence that bad news has reached the person. The scary black dog that appears to a girl in her dream indicates that a man has proposed to the person.

title: The Black Sea in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Black Sea in a dream for a single girl: Seeing the Black Sea also refers to a dream of an unmarried girl. Psychological pain contains painful memories, which lie inside him as a result of a previous emotional experience. While seeing swimming in the Black Sea shows that the girl is trying to forget the past. It also overcomes His pain and sorrows and start again, and God knows best. You may be interested in: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing the Black Sea in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the Black Sea intersects with the dream of a married woman. Because of her feeling of insecurity and certainty in her life and her constant fear of the future. It also suggests a vision of descent. To the Black Sea in a dream. However, the woman tries to accept her life, coexist with those around her, and overcome her feeling of fear. Interpretation of seeing the Black Sea in a dream for a man and its meaning. The Black Sea in a man’s dream means that you will hear sad news. Exposure to negative events at work greatly affects his condition. Psychological. While a man falls into the Black Sea in a dream, this is a sign of causing serious harm to his family. This is interpreted through forbidden money obtained by an unfair and corrupt person. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about floating in the sea. Meaning of seeing the Black Sea in a woman’s dream The pregnant woman and her interpretation. Interpretation lawyers also say that a pregnant woman is swimming in the Black Sea in a dream. An indication that the health condition of the fetus is not good, and God knows best. It also indicates a vision of a pregnant woman falling into the Black Sea in a dream. Miscarriage of the fetus, and it may die immediately after birth, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the Black Sea in a dream for young people and its meaning. Imam Ibn Sirin says that the Black Sea in a dream for young people expresses the horror of the world around him. Also, his sins in this world are the ones that will affect him and ruin his life. Walking towards the Black Sea in a dream is interpreted through the future. The unknown dreamer, lack of ambition in striving and working, and surrender to failure. Interpretation of seeing a raging sea in a dream. The raging sea in a dream also symbolizes obstacles and obstacles that prevent the dreamer from realizing his dreams and achieving his future goals. Feeling afraid of the raging sea in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will travel far for work. And he earns money. It is also said that entering a rough sea in a dream is a sign that the dreamer follows the people of lies. He deviates from the path of truth, and helps the oppressor, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the dark sea in a dream: Seeing the dark sea in a dream indicates a little luck, bad luck, and many One of the problems in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a very dark sea in a dream is interpreted by many worries, sorrows, and painful experiences in life, and God knows best. Swimming in the dark sea is evidence of illegal trade and earning money through suspicious means, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a calm and clear sea for a married woman. Interpretation Seeing a flood in a dream: The interpretation of dreaming of a sea flood in a dream varies depending on what happened during the flood. Just as crops and lands were lost and buildings collapsed, this translates into...

title: Interpretation of a dream about flying a plane by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about flying a plane: Seeing a plane ride in a dream has many meanings and connotations, such as those that express good news and pleasant news, and others that only bring sorrows, worries, and negative events. It is related to seeing a plane trip in a dream in the following article. Interpretation of a dream about flying a plane Watching a plane flight in a dream has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: If a person sees in his dream that he is flying a plane, this is clear evidence that he is able to make important and correct decisions in matters. His life, which leads to his success in all aspects. If a person sees in his dream that he is flying an airplane, this is a sign of high status and high status in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about riding an airplane in a person’s dream symbolizes that he is close to God, pious, and has a righteous character that avoids suspicions and follows suit. On the straight path, which leads to God being pleased with him. In the event that the dreamer is suffering from sadness and accumulated debts and sees in his dream that he is flying a plane, then he will earn a lot of money and will be able to return the rights to their owners in the near future. Watching a plane flight in a dream for someone symbolizes a change in the situation from difficulty to relief and from anxiety to comfort. If someone is looking for a job and sees in his dream that he is flying the plane, he will get a prestigious job from which he will earn a lot of money and improve his standard of living. Interpretation The dream of flying a plane by Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of the meanings and connotations associated with seeing flying in general in a dream, and we will count the interpretations on planes as well as the following: If a person sees in his dream that he is flying a plane, this is clear evidence that God will grant him reward and success in all aspects. His life. If a person sees in his dream that he is riding a plane, this is a sign of the ability to achieve the goals and demands that he has been trying to achieve for a long time. If the dreamer is a student and dreams of riding a plane, this is a sign of good luck that accompanies him in his studies and his excellence in the scientific aspect. If he sees If someone feels dread and fear of boarding a plane, he is going through a difficult period characterized by crises, difficult times, and obstacles that disrupt his life and prevent him from being happy, which leads to the deterioration of his psychological state. What is the interpretation of a dream about a solo plane ride? Watching a plane flight in a dream for individuals has many meanings and connotations, the most important of which are the following: If the dreamer is single and sees in her dream that she is flying a plane, then this is a clear indication that she will meet her future husband and he will be the ideal person who will help her. In reaching the peak of glory. If a girl who has never been married before is thinking about traveling abroad and sees in a dream that she is boarding a plane, this is a clear indication that she will have a travel opportunity that will bring many benefits in the near future. The interpretation of a dream about a girl who is still... Studying in a dream about riding a plane indicates her ability to remember her lessons, pass exams with distinction, and achieve unparalleled success in the scientific aspect. Seeing herself riding a small plane is a bad omen.

title: Interpretation of preparing food in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of preparing food in a dream: The interpretation of seeing yourself preparing food, preparing it in a dream, or dreaming that you are preparing food is cooking it and preparing it for serving. A dream through the different website. Interpretation of seeing yourself preparing food in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing yourself preparing food in a dream indicates achieving the dreamer’s ambitions and goals in life. To see in a dream that you are preparing meals to feed others indicates the dreamer’s good morals and his love for people and helping him meet their needs. The scene of cooking in a dream indicates what the dreamer will receive in terms of livelihood and many good things in the coming days. Seeing a dream while cooking while setting food on fire indicates a good and distinguished job that the dreamer will soon acquire. Interpretation of seeing preparing food in a dream for a man: Seeing a man in a dream In the kitchen means a lot of money is on its way to him, and it means luck and success that will accompany it. Seeing a man entering the kitchen to prepare food means that he will find work and a distinguished position in his work. Seeing a married man cooking delicious food in his sleep indicates a happy and stable married life that he will live. Seeing a married man He cooks delicious food in a dream means that he will succeed in a project or job that he accepts. Interpretation of seeing someone prepare food in a dream: Seeing a single person cooking delicious food during his sleep indicates that he will get married soon. Seeing a lonely man cooking Chinese food in his sleep indicates that he has been very successful in his field. Seeing a single man cooking French food in a dream means that he will have the opportunity to travel abroad to do what he dreams of. Interpretation of seeing yourself preparing food in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl cooking delicious food in a dream indicates that she will soon marry a good man with morals. Hamida. Seeing an unmarried girl cooking bread during her sleep shows that she will succeed in achieving everything she wants and strives for. Seeing an unmarried girl cooking meat in a dream shows what will bring her goodness, money, and a lot of living in the coming period. When an unmarried girl dreams that she She cooks chicken, it means that she will marry a person with whom she will live a happy and joyful life. Seeing an unmarried girl cooking couscous in a dream means that her marriage will be soon, and God knows best. Also read: cutting hair in a dream for a woman. Interpretation of seeing yourself preparing food in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman preparing food For her family in a dream means that she runs her home efficiently and cares a lot about her husband and children. Seeing a married woman preparing food and seeing it cooking in her sleep indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman cooking rice in a dream indicates either positive changes that her life will witness soon or an indication that she will move on. To a new home. The sight of a married woman cooking couscous in a dream indicates that she will soon receive money that may be an inheritance. Seeing a married woman cooking in a dream means happiness and success in the coming days. Seeing a married woman in a dream in an unclean kitchen indicates problems that will arise.

title: The 10 most important interpretations of seeing execution in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing execution in a dream? Evidence of alienation from God and religion. Interpretation of seeing neck throbbing in a dream? Free from a sign of imprisonment. What is the interpretation of a man who sees that he has been executed and was actually suffering from worries? It indicates death, anguish and anguish. Meaning of seeing Implementing the death penalty? Details of the ordeals that the viewer will be exposed to in the coming period. What is the interpretation of seeing execution in a man’s dream? Evidence that he paid off the debt and took the money. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s execution. Execution in a dream is a sign of alienation from God and religion. Seeing the death penalty in a dream and striking the neck A sign of freedom from worries and problems. Whoever dreams of being executed or someone is trying to execute him, this indicates that he will be saved from trouble and imprisonment and will be liberated. If a person sees in a dream that he is being executed and in reality he is suffering from fears, this indicates the death of anxiety and anguish. If one dreams That he is being executed, this indicates recovery from illness. Executing a debtor is evidence of paying the debt. Seeing beheading and execution is evidence of the death of the father and mother. A slap on the neck in a dream is a sign of liberation from prison. Seeing a person in a dream, the ruler, beating subjects This is a sign of forgiveness of sins. If someone is sentenced to death and beaten, he will receive goods and money, and if the strike is known, he will be cured of illness. Seeing a dream about Nabulsi being executed. Execution in a dream is a sign of high status. If one sees an executioner in a dream, this indicates sins. And repentance. If the dreamer sees that he is executing someone, this means that he will reach a high position. In some visions, execution can be a sign of a quick life and ease of dealing with all worldly matters. Execution in a dream means abandoning prayer. Seeing the execution of the death penalty is evidence of... The tribulations that the viewer will be exposed to in the future. Execution may sometimes mean turning away from God and abandoning prayer. Execution in a king’s dream is evidence of liberation. Interpretation of a dream of execution for a man: Seeing a man executed and hanged in a dream is evidence of delving into people’s symptoms. If a man dreams that he is about to be executed, But someone saved him, this indicates that he will gain wealth. After that, seeing an execution could be an indication of fear, anxiety, and a feeling of dread. Execution in a dream is evidence of the need to reevaluate the personal relationship. After that, seeing an execution in a man’s dream could be a sign On spending debts and getting money. Interpretation of a dream about execution for a married woman: Seeing execution in a dream for a married woman is a sign of having fun and avoiding worship and remembrance of God. If a woman is worried, seeing execution will be a source of relief for her and she will soon rest. So, seeing someone executed in a dream is A sign of disobedience and sins.

title: I dreamed that my husband's sister was telling me that she was engaged

preview.html: I dreamed that my husband's sister announced to me that she was engaged. The science of dream interpretation or the science of interpreting visions is an Islamic legal science whose laws and foundations are derived from the Holy Qur’an and the Sunnah of the Prophet. But she did not study academically. There are many verses, evidence and hadiths in the Qur’an and Sunnah that indicate the reality of dreams and that some of them have clear and intended meanings and messages to people and society. That is why many religious scholars were interested in this science and wrote many books about it that are still used to interpret dreams to this day and in our article, after which we will answer the question I dreamed that his sister in law was telling me that he was engaged. Why do we dream and what are dreams? It is worth noting that Dreams are not a childish thing, but rather a trivial thing that we see in the moments when we lose consciousness, to put them in order and focus on the things that a person really wants to focus on and neglect them, unless it is thought. Is it repetitive or focused? Situations and thoughts begin to appear before our eyes during REM sleep and our minds react to them as if they were real and our reaction during a dream can be the same as an answer. We do if we find ourselves in the same situation. The concept of engagement in a dreamThere are many indications of a person dreaming of engagement. If you see yourself when you are young and single and engaged to a married woman, it means that you cannot achieve the goals you have set, but if you see yourself proposing to a beautiful girl, it means that you will soon achieve your desires. As for your vision of yourself while preparing for the engagement procedures without seeing the engagement itself This indicates that you do not have a sense of the family atmosphere and feel lonely, or if the fiancée is an already engaged girl and the engagement procedures have not been completed, she must be very careful and think carefully before taking a new step in the matter of engagement, such as seeing the person you dream of dancing at a party. His engagement and the distribution of party cards indicate that he is facing some problems at the present time or that he will suffer from them in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of someone I know: A person may dream of the engagement of one of his relatives or friends, and this has many connotations. If one sees that his father has gotten engaged, this indicates that he is trying to meet an important person. If a girl sees one of her friends holding an engagement ring, this indicates that she will soon receive news of a friend’s engagement, and getting engaged in a dream generally indicates joy, kindness, and hope. Interpretation of a dream about a person who promised me marriage. If an unmarried girl dreams of someone who promises her engagement, this means that she will receive Good news soon, as it indicates that she is thinking a lot about marriage. Or finding a new job and seeing someone you know or love engaging in a dream indicates the coming of goodness for you and for him, comfort, the end of problems, and the beginning of a new life. At the end of the article we summarize the most important points we talked about, what we dream about, what are the dreams and meanings of engaging in a dream, what is Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of someone I know, interpretation of a dream about a person who promised me marriage

title: Interpretation of rubies in a dream and a ruby ​​ring in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of sapphire for single women, for married women, for pregnant women: either blue, red, white, emerald, green, ruby ​​necklace, precious stones by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of rubies in a dream: Rubies in a dream are money, joy, and fun. According to the words of God Almighty: (As if they were rubies and coral). If you see a ruby ​​in a dream, this means that you will be lucky, especially in a romantic relationship. If you are in a relationship and dream that you lost a ruby, this means that your loved one is ignoring you and turning away from you. If you are pregnant and you see a ruby ​​in a dream, this It means that you will give birth to a girl. If you dream that someone gives you a ruby ​​ring, it means that you will get married, while if you see a ruby ​​stone, it means that you will receive money from strangers. If you see in a dream a large number of ruby ​​stones, it means that you will continue to learn and study. If You saw a ruby ​​in a dream, then this may indicate the goodness and joy that awaits you in the next period of your real life. If you are sick and you see a ruby ​​in a dream, this means that you will recover from your illness and soon you will become active, energetic and healthy. If you dream that you are holding in your hand a pebble that looks like a ruby, but it is in Reality is not a ruby, it means that you pretend to be what you are not and that you deceive the people around you. And soon the matter will be revealed and your truth will appear. Rubies carry many meanings in a dream. For example, it is joy and pleasure for the dreamer, as if he sees himself adorned with rubies, so rubies are an adornment for him. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is giving a ruby ​​ring to a woman he wants to marry, then he will marry a beautiful woman. And beautiful. Many rubies in a dream, if the dreamer acquires them, means gaining knowledge and study, and if he is a merchant, this indicates the prosperity of trade. Rubies sometimes indicate a cruel friend. Whoever sees that he has obtained a red ruby, this means that he will have a beautiful wife or A maid, and if he sees that he is beaten several times, it is hated money. Rubies were found to be converted into money by non-Arabs. Many rubies are for the world to know, the ruler to command, and the merchant to trade. It was said: Sapphire is a difficult friend. And whoever has a wreath of rubies and coral, this is his glory and power from a woman. Perhaps the ruby ​​was food for the poor, perhaps it was a copy of the Qur’an, and perhaps the sick person was saved from hellfire, because fire does not work on rubies. And whoever sees a ruby ​​red case in his hand, then a beautiful, hard-hearted woman will love him. And whoever sees in his hand a stone that resembles a ruby ​​and not a ruby, he is claiming honor and not honour. Interpretation of blue sapphires in a dreamBlue sapphires Seeing a blue sapphire in a dream means good luck and profit, and for a girl it means success in choosing a husband. Interpretation of sapphires in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin said Rubies in a dream are a sign of joy and happiness. Whoever sees in his dream that his ring is made of rubies, this indicates that he will be one of the religious scholars and religious scholars, and his fame will become famous and his name will become famous. And whoever thinks that he took a piece of ruby ​​and a woman gave birth to it, this foretells that she will give birth to a girl.

While if he sees that he hopes to get a fish in a dream, it is a sign of Wide and abundant food, and it may indicate that money comes from afar, and he benefits from it.
